revised_title: Electrodischarge Texturing of Steel Rolls: A Theoretical Model
tldr: This article presents a theoretical model for the surface texturing of steel rolls using electrodischarge machining. The model explains the process of texturing by analyzing the effects of various process parameters, such as the applied voltage, on-time, and gap width, on the surface roughness and peak count of the textured roll. The model provides an order of magnitude estimate of the peak count, which is in agreement with experimental values.
